description:
Skitrix is a fabulous variation of two of the world's most popular games. Take that legendary falling block game and combine it with the world's most loved word making board game, and voila! You have Skitrix! This brilliant game tests your vocabulary and your reflexes as random letters falling from the sky must be shifted and connected into the longest words you can possibly make. When you make a word in a row or a column, the word goes "pop" and disappears, adding to your score and clearing up more room for you to keep going. Then there are those special Skitrix blocks... the blue and red pills, and of course, the bomb. The pills will destroy any row or column you drop them on, while the bomb wipes out both the row and column for some heavy duty destruction!

If you like falling block games or word games, you will absolutely *LOVE* Skitrix. So, try this sensational game for yourself and... let the letters fall!
